text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS, @WhiteHouse Admin & @FoxNews Host are a lying & misinformation & misdirection campaign about #COVID19 #coronavirus, Fake Cures, Testing, Opening Risks & now Fake Voting improprieties with Mail In Voting. Trump know Russia can’t hack Mail In Votes.
